EmailTemplate.name: Step Forward Keeping Warm Submitted Applications
EmailTemplate.subject: Step Forward: Thank you for your application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Step Forward News!
Thank you for previously submitting an application to Step Forward. We know it’s a busy time for you with exams and wanted to get in touch to let you know what we’ve been up to.
We’re currently processing your application and, if you’re successful, we’ll be in contact after summer exams to invite you to an assessment.
In the meantime, we wanted to give you a little taster of what you could be doing on Step Forward. Read on!
Our Associates Tell All
So, what's it really like to be on Step Forward? We spoke to Emily our Associate at Thomson Reuters, a multinational company that works in over 100 countries. Here’s what she had to say…
“The biggest surprise is feeling like you are really respected by the people you work with and that you are a crucial part of the team”
-Emily, Step Forward Associate
Step Forward is… starting my working life by helping me to put my foot in the world of work.
The Training. I take part in Step Forward training every Thursday. I have really enjoyed our 5 week project called ’Make your Mark-et’ which is a chance to work in a group, develop skills and gain some practical experience. We are creating business plans and will be able to sell the product or service in a few weeks’ time.
The Job. My responsibilities include sorting out new starters and leavers, recruitment and interviews. The best day in my job so far was when I had a conference call with one of our colleagues in America. I also got to be involved in the charity boat race at Canary Wharf after my first few weeks.
If you want to hear more from Emily and other people on Step Forward head over to our one-stop-shop for all things Step Forward: the Step Forward blog.
And as always, if you want ask any questions please feel free to get in touch via email, facebook or twitter.
Best wishes,
The Step Forward Team
